resources.string: This app provides general health and nutrition information for educational purposes only. It is not intended as medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare professional before making any changes to your diet, exercise, or health regimen. Use this app at your own risk. If youâ€™d like to an Accredited Practicing Dietitian (APD), please visit the Monash Nutrition/Dietetics Clinic (discounted rates for students): https://www.monash.edu/medicine/scs/nutrition/clinics/nutrition
This app is only for pre-registered users. Please enter your ID and password or register to claim your account on your first visit.
